name: Speciality Steels UK Ltd
membership: Liberty Steel is a member of Eurofer. Our CEO and other staff are involved with EEF/UK Steel, CBI, Institute of Materials, Minerals & Mining.
goal:
Liberty Speciality Steels is a key business of Liberty Steel; a fully-integrated electric arc-based steel manufacturer and distributor within the global metal trading and industrials group, Liberty House Group, a member of the GFG Alliance. Capabilities range from liquid steel production through to high-value precision-engineered products, sold around the world and all underpinning the Liberty House Group’s GREENSTEEL vision for competitive, low-carbon and sustainable production. Speciality Steels is focused on offering alloy and stainless steel grades for use in demanding sectors such as Aerospace, Oil and Gas, Industrial Engineering and Bearings, and in the manufacture of Bright Bar,
Narrow Strip and niche engineering applications for customers around the world. Speciality Steels employs around 1700 staff and has major production centres in Sheffield and Rotherham, service centres in Rotherham,
Wednesbury, and Bolton (Specialist Aerospace). In addition it has service centres in Nagpur (India), Suzhou and Xi’an (China) and Commercial offices in the UK, France, Germany, USA, UAE, India and China.
